summary: AI Engineer with robust experience in AI applications development, ranging from architecting Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems to deploying Computer Vision models in production. Proficient in PyTorch, with a strong focus on building scalable backend services and LLM applications using FastAPI and Docker. Skilled in optimization techniques for LLMs and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines that solve complex classification and retrieval problems.

work_history.description: Developed AI applications including RAG systems and Computer Vision models.
